categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The YV-865 Aurore-class freighter was a bulky freighter transport used during the Clone Wars. It became known as the Zygerrian slave ship due to its widespread use by slavers such as Zygerrians and Thalassians.

Darts D'Nar, a Zygerrian who allied himself with Count Dooku and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, captained a reddish-colored slave ship named the Tecora. Another grey-colored ship, the Delta-T-3 was used to transport a captive Obi-Wan Kenobi, CT-7567 "Rex" and the Kiros governor Roshti to the planet Kadavo.
